contentItem.name: com.silabs.content.demos.c8051f970dk.kit.si8051.c8051f970dk.demo.f97x_pca0_high_speed_output
contentItem.label: PCA0 High Speed Output
contentItem.description:
PCA High Speed Output Example

This example project uses the PCA's High Speed Output mode to generate
a 100KHz square wave on P0.2.

The user can connect an oscilloscope or logic analyzer to pin P0.2
to view the generated waveform and/or to pin P0.1 to view SYSCLK.
